item.title: Gauge control with two values (Silverlight)
item.description: While developing the dashboard to display several performance indexes, I bumped into the task of visualizing the pair of numbers on a single gauge. One number would show a person’s performance metric, while the other one would display the person group’s performance indicator to compare with. I couldn’t find a ready control to use, so I decided to design my own.

item.title: Hunting memory leaks in Silverlight
item.description: Recently, I’ve spent a couple of days seeking and fixing memory leaks in our Silverlight application. It might be tough sometimes, but it’s a good ‘brain-teasing’ practice and it’s a good way to learn how inner things work.
